page.title: 06Leisure Activities
page.content: You would be wrong to think that there is not much to do here. There is a thriving Young Farmer's Club,who have a prizewinning Drama group, and a Women's Institute who do a lot beside making jam! The Shire football team do very well in the League, and the under-13s have a team too. There is Saturday rounders in the summer, and badminton and indoor bowls in the winter. We have keen fishermen,bee keepers,naturalists,and goat owners, who do well at the local agricultural shows.Some children have ponies, and are members of the local pony club. There is an annual sheepdog trial, motor cycle scrambles are held on a farm in the area, and there is a Keep Fit class in the winter, and yoga all year round. In September, the annual Leek Show is held, when the keen gardeners show their produce.
